name: Dig Deeper (Cyanilux)
description:
Descend into the earth and mine gold! But be careful, there's bats and slimes that don't want you there. If you lose all your hearts the game will restart. Find the hole to go deeper to the next floor. They're procedurally generated so will be different each time.

There's not really an end to the game and it lacks some progression / more enemies, but enjoy anyway!

Intended to be played with Keyboard (WASD to Move, E to Interact) & Mouse (to Aim, LMB to Attack/Mine, RMB to throw a bomb)

Made as part of Ludum Dare Jam 48
